phrases: At the netherworld's bottom, I will be waiting.
What made you decide to swipe this...?
Well, it is a letter that my mom wrote to me, you see!
That makes it mine!
So, you are serious about going, then?
Yep!
And that is why I want your help!
My mother is waiting for me.
What is your plan once you pass beyond the Seeker Camp?
I will head for the bottom of the Abyss, where my mom is waiting!
The route from there is-
What is the matter, Nat?
I am against it!
The bottom of the Abyss...
You talk about it like it is no big deal, but if you go there you will never be able to return!
What is this all of a sudden?!
I have always wanted to be a White Whistle.
So I am already prepared for that.
No!
Riko, you do not get it!
You will never be able to see any of us up here ever again, you know!
That is right!
You will not be able to hang out at Auntie's, attend Leader's lessons,
or play with any of us here again!
That is right!
Like I said...
I know that, okay...?!
Wh-what are you crying about?!
You are crying too, are not you?!
O-ouch!
I am not crying a bit!
Anyway, let us call it a night and get some rest.
Nat, you dummy!
Anyway, let us call it a night and get some rest.
I am no dummy.
That is you, Riko!
Tomorrow is Reg's first cave-raid and all... I am no dummy.
That is you, Riko!
Tomorrow is Reg's first cave-raid and all... Jeez, shut up already!
Jeez, shut up already!
Alright!
Jeez, shut up already!
O-o-o-ow!
At the netherworld's bottom, I will be waiting...
Cut it out!
At the netherworld's bottom, I will be waiting...
Everyone, unable to resist, goes down in
Make those eyes shine brighter than a torch
The destination we are aiming for is deep
We squarely lose our way
The trap of the open-mouthed netherworld
Let us chase the traces of truth
If an answer can be found now, we do not mind losing it all
The echo is still reverberating
So that we do not part with that voice
The compass is always
Pointed to the darkness
Where there is no escape
In that direction
Even if that is a curse
The pulse is the real thing
Never again will the yearning stop
Fifth layer: In the sandstone area of the Sea of Corpses, I came across a seven-tailed scorpion.
It exceeded two meters in size...
I have decided to call it a stingerhead.
While sheltering from the rain on the sixth layer, I encountered this one...
a lizard that grows up while still inside its eggshell.
Thanks to its she will, it appears to be unfazed by the iron rain.
I will call it an emperorshell.
Nearing the seventh layer, I came across a human-looking silhouette...
not sure what is really was...
For a little while now, it has been intently observing me.
Damn idiot, I am watching you too, you know.
It is about the size of a human child.
It did not give off the impression of being a Hollow... so perhaps it actually is a person?
In the first place, where did it even come from?
I do not know...
But, I am getting closer to the answer.
Reg...
Reg!
What is it?
If you dig up the grass like that, all you are going to find are bugs.
If you are set on digging, try that flat spot right over there.
This here?
Oh?
Oh my...
Nat, what is this thing?
It is round and squishy...
Ah, uh...
That thing's also a Relic of the Abyss.
Do Not Know what exactly, though...
It is got some amazing force holding it together...
Is it possible this could be a special-grade Relic?
No way.
You will not find anything but junk around here.
It is hard to believe this is junk...
Wait a minute, if it is junk, does that mean it is okay if I keep it?
Hey, they will string up you naked for that, you know.
Even junk sells for good money over in foreign countries.
Being an apprentice sure is tough, huh?
Yeah...
Look, there is something else back there.
Nat, this is amazing!
There is no end to these squishy things in here!
Right?
You just leave it to me!
There is still more!
What?!
What... is that thing?!
Huh?
Ah, that is a skeleton of someone in prayer.
Remains like those are from 2,000 years ago, apparently.
And all of'them are posed that same way.
Oh...
Anyway, you sure freaked out considering you are a robot.
Which reminds me...
you ever hear this story before?
Children who have been eagerly awaiting their birthdays...
have been dying one after the other when that day arrives.
The causes for their deaths vary... but all of them invariably perish on their birthdays.
In the west district alone, the count is already up to eight kids.
Rumor is, if you look into a mirror on the morning of your birthday,
your reflection will have a twisted neck.
And once you see it...!
I do not believe in that kind of stuff!
Look at this robot who is so spooked he is dripping with sweat!
But... there is one thing I want to believe.
Huh?
And it is that answers lie waiting at the bottom of the netherworld.
The true nature of these Relics... the because of the Curse of the Abyss...
perhaps even the meaning behind my creation... or the reason I came here.
Will not I find answers to all those questions if I reach the bottom of the Abyss?
That is the feeling I get, anyway.
Wh-what...?
You and Riko both...
You are crazy!
Like I said yesterday, I am against going, okay?!
I mean, you are both Red Whistles, and she is still only 12 years old!
Nat, you...
Anyway, I am against it!
Over there.
Even after my first cave-raid, my memory still did not come back...
In that case, the key indeed must be...
Reg, wait up...
Nat?!
Reg... Nat?!
What is wrong?!
It is the Curse of the Abyss...
So you really are unfazed by it...
And you are going at a hell of a pace, too...
Sorry, I was lost in thought and did not notice.
Want me to go fetch somebody?
Nah, I am okay now.
I am totally fine, really.
I do not even feel it...
I guess I really am a robot, huh?
In that case, that silhouette must also...
Shiggy mentioned something about an Aubade...
So I am also just a Relic, then?
Why did I come here...?
And why does not that silhouette come up here?
Did I come from the bottom of the netherworld...?
What the heck is down there?
I want to know!
Just what it is...
that I am.
Well then...
have you decided what day you are going to set off?
I will head out tomorrow just before daybreak.
Huh?!
I have already packed my things.
You sure are not wasting any time.
But, how exactly do you plan on slipping into the Abyss, anyway?
They keep watch all the time...
Well...
I will use my extending arms to lower you down.
Huh?!
Riko, I am going all the way to the bottom of the netherworld along with you.
Huh?!
Reg...
I was sure that you would be on the side of trying to stop her...
I bet Riko enticed you into going, did not she?
Wha-?!
Riko did not say a single thing to try to get me to go with her.
I decided on my own.
I want to go to find out just what I am exactly.
Reg...
thank you!
I could not bring myself to say anything...
I am going to meet my mom, so hogging you all to myself...
I did not think that would be right...
Were not you the one who found me in the first place?
I have already climbed the Abyss once, right?
Even if my memory does not return, I have this sturdy body all the same.
I will protect you all the way down to the bottom of the netherworld.
Guess there is no stopping you...
Sorry, I will be sad to leave you guys, but my curiosity got the better of me.
It is fine.
Even if we tried to stop her, Riko very well may have gone on her own, anyway.
By the way, Reg, do you have any idea what lies in your path on the way to the netherworld's bottom?
I know there are a bunch of random dangerous creatures.
And Relics and stuff, too...
Do not tell me...
you think you can reach the bottom by using your extending arms to descend little by little...
Is that more or less your plan?
I suppose there will be some obstacles, but to be honest that is my plan.
How naive!
I have got to say you are far too optimistic!
The Abyss is teeming with dangers beyond your imagination!
What is that?
It is the latest Rough Map of the Netherworld.
Huh?
That is amazing, Shiggy!
You just went and took it, huh?
Riko, you are serious about challenging the Abyss.
Sneaking into the director's office is nothing compared to that.
This is the current state of the Abyss.
Down to 1,350 meters is the depths' first layer: the Edge of the Abyss.
The creatures and environment here do not really change,
but beasts from the second layer sometimes come up to feed, so keep your guard up.
Starting here it is the second layer: the Forest of Temptation.
The strain of ascending is said to suddenly become more severe.
If a Red Whistle descends down that far, no help will be sent after them...
That is because both heading there and returning home become very difficult.
It is treated as a suicide.
The forest eventually takes the shape of a rat guard, and at that point you enter the Inverted Forest.
The air currents are super unstable and savage predators fill the skies, so be careful.
The third layer: the Great Fault.
Here you will find a vertical cliff face of over 4,000 meters standing in your way.
The fourth layer: only Black Whistles and above can go here.
The depth is about 7,000 meters.
They call it the Goblet of Giants.
The fifth layer: the Sea of Corpses.
This is the domain of White Whistles alone,
and you can count the number of people who have returned from here on your hands.
The sixth layer: the Capital of the Unreturned.
When a White Whistle descends to the sixth layer, people call it their last dive.
That is because they will never be able to return home.
Are there any cases of someone who is not a White Whistle going down lower than the sixth layer?
Perhaps there are...
But if someone other than a White Whistle sends information up from the Abyss,
it will be considered mere rumor.
That is because it is possible the Curse of the Abyss
caused the person to become confused or even go crazy.
However, if the voice of a White Whistle reaches the surface, it will be considered truth.
The voices of White Whistles are the voices of the Abyss.
Even if a White Whistle loses his life, he lives on as a voice of the Abyss...
and guides everyone.
Just as I thought, that letter is for real.
Look, Riko, sorry to bring this up when you are so fired up to go-
No matter what you say, I am still going!
My mom is waiting for me, after all!
Hey, have you even been paying attention?!
Think anyone could live somewhere like that for 10 years?!
Wh-what are...?
Think about it!
Why did her whistle make its way to the surface?!
Your mom died a long time ago!
No, I...
Riko!
Oh, there, there.
I have lowered the luggage and spare clothes.
Okay, thanks!
With this on, you think they will be able to tell who I am?
Probably not.
By the way, where is Nat?
Yeah...
Right now Nat is probably-
I do not care what that guy's doing!
Nat was so worried about you that he ended up crossing the line.
Hmph!
Riko... you might never get the chance to see him again, right?
Do you really want to just leave things unresolved like this?
I do not want to either.
But, he is against us going...
and he said some nasty stuff.
Hey, Reg, what do you think I should do?
Riko, if Nat apologizes, will you forgive him?
Y-yeah...
But he can be quite stubborn...
Do not worry.
Nat was regretting what he did.
Really?!
Really.
Alright, both of you!
If you do not get going soon, you will run out of time!
So as not to draw attention, we will all leave one by one in 10 minutes.
Got it?
Shiggy, you want a hand, too?
I will get down there myself.
Shiggy, I am sorry, but there is still something I need to do.
You go on ahead.
Fine, but be really careful not to get caught by Leader.
I know.
Nat...?
Nat?
He is not here...
Is he with Riko and Shiggy?!
Kiyui... Kiyui...
What...?
I came to say goodbye.
Are you not feeling well?
Come to think of it, you have been looking like you are always sleepy lately.
The day after tomorrow is my birthday.
I see.
I hope you get better before your big day.
Grow up nice and strong.
Kiyui, on the morning of your birthday, do not look into a mirror.
Why?
Just do not.
Got it.
See you.
Farewell.
That took longer than I thought.
I have got to hurry.
Where you going?
T-to the bathroom...
There are not any toilets in that room, you know.
I-I was still half asleep...
Leader, what are you doing up in the middle of the night yourself?
You fool, I am on patrol.
I do this every night after you all fall asleep.
Any idea where Riko is?
She does not seem to be in her room...
Riko... went to take a dump!
In the middle of the night?
She has the runs...
She scavenging for food again?
Jeez, that girl...
You are on your way to the toilet too, right?
Stay with her and make sure she is okay.
Roger!
Ah, here he comes!
Sorry I took so long.
Shiggy, we are headed off to the wharf quarter now, right?
Yeah, the usual Gate to the Netherworld is always closely guarded, after all.
I hear the wharf quarter in the slums has a good spot to enter from.
You hear?
Yep.
We have never actually been to the wharf quarter before... so I called someone to help us.
We are in your hands.
This smell is...
Nat!
What are you doing here?
Well...
Sorry.
That was wrong... what I did yesterday.
I forgive you!
Huh?!
S-so, even though I said such terrible things you still...?
It is fine!
I want us to make up.
Today... is the day we say farewell, after all!
Y-you do not know the way to the wharf quarter, do you?
Follow me.
So, Nat, you are helping us out because you are okay with us going now, right?
I am still against it!
Huh, you oppose it?!
I am glad, Nat.
Glad you came today.
Now Riko and I will both be able to send off our letters without any reservations.
You dummy!
The first or second layers are one thing,
but from where you are going a mail balloon will never make it to the surface.
Is that so?
Well even for a White Whistle,
the odds of a mail balloon making it to the surface from the deeper depths are VERY low.
It will be alright!
I will send a ton of'them, okay?
I bet my mother did the same thing.
I mean, this At the netherworld's bottom, I will be waiting looks like it was scrawled out hastily...
And perhaps she sent several different sealed documents...
and then put one of these inside each of them.
What is the matter?
Well, Riko, I was thinking one of your fanciful ideas surprisingly makes sense for a change.
That is so mean!
Is this still part of Orth?
The wharf district, you see, was founded by people who were cave-raiding illegally.
Buildings kept being added on as the quarter grew, and now half it is encroaching into the Abyss.
Whoa...
Shh!
You are being too loud.
And do not look around at everything so much.
Nat, have you been here before?
Well, this is where I was born.
You were?
I was rag-picking ever since I can remember.
My big sis died so I was left without any relatives, and then I was taken in by the orphanage.
That is the story I told Leader when I first entered the orphanage...
Kids around here all see that Gate to the Netherworld and start aspiring to be cave raiders...
I got lucky and was taken in off the streets...
Otherwise, like everyone else here, I would have gotten sick from the toxins in the garbage or died.
If I can become a Moon Whistle like Leader, I would like to open an orphanage here.
Nat, you of all people can do it!
You are just about as good at cave-raiding as I am, and you are full of energy.
Cannot you come up with some better compliments than that?
Oh, man...
We are already here.
So this thing really does fit me to a T.
Now where did I put that whistle...?
What is this here?
Is this...?!
I think there is a real possibility.
You will have an Aubade with you, so I will definitely be a believer if one of your mail balloons makes it here.
Then, I will make sure to include a souvenir with each of them.
I am counting on it.
I will keep on waiting as long as I need to, okay?
Riko...
I will keep on waiting as long as I need to, okay?
Riko!
Nat!
You are really amazing, Nat!
I never thought we would make it out here with so little trouble!
Y-yeah...
Thanks,
Nat!
YOU-um, Riko...
Huh...?
Dammit!
So much...
Listen...
Even though I thought about it so much...
It is alright!
Even if...
Even if we never get to see each other again, we will be connected by the Abyss.
Whether it is on the surface... or in the far reaches of the cursed netherworld...
the two of us... are connected to the Abyss!
I will never forget about the time I spent up here, okay?
So it will be alright!
What now?
There you go again...
That is right!
I am at it again!
Shut up!
Oh, crap!
Some of the residents are awake now!
Who are those brats?!
Oh, crap!
Some of the residents are awake now!
Reg, hurry!
Well, I guess this can wait.
You better send some letters!
I will make sure to find them, okay?
Be careful, alright?
And it is fine if you decide to head right on back here, you know!
I am counting on you to take care of Riko!
Understood.
You guys care take of yourselves, too.
Thank you to both of you!
Keep an eye out for the good news I will be sending!
Well then, we are off now!
Heading into the chasm for which even darkness is no match...
For those who offer up their bodies and challenge it, the Abyss is said to provide all...
Life and death, curses and blessings - all of it...
At the end of their journeys, what will they come to finally choose?
Will that be determined by the will of the netherworld?
Or will it be determined solely by those who challenge it?
